quote: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out. – Robert Collier
fact: In the last 3,500 years, there have been approximately 230 years of peace throughout the civilized world.
joke: As I get older, I think of all the people I lost along the way. Maybe a career as a tour guide wasn't such a good idea.
